Extended Campus     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Extended Campus      Extended Campus   Main Menu    Courses    Programs           Certificate in Nonprofit Management    Grant Writing Workshop    Project Management Courses    Social Enterprise Certificate         Online Pathways    Partner With Us     Eyebrow menu    Contact Us    About    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                              Extended Campus       Extended Campus  Beyond the Classroom                        COVID-19 Information & Resources  Officials at the University of Illinois at Chicago, the University of Illinois System and public health officials locally and nationally, are closely monitoring an outbreak of respiratory illness caused by a novel (new) coronavirus, named COVID-19.  UIC has created a central webpage to bring the latest news and information about COVID-19 to the campus community. Use the link below to stay informed.   COVID-19 UPDATES           UIC Extended Campus   UIC Extended Campus provides learners of all ages with innovative and transformative courses and programs to further their growth as individuals.        Courses and Programs by Field        Professional Development          Applied Health Sciences          Business          Education          Engineering          Liberal Arts & Sciences          Medicine          Nursing          Pharmacy          Public Health          Social Work          Urban Planning and Public Affairs             Online Nursing Program        “ The UIC RN to BSN program really opens your eyes to looking at nursing differently, not just the skills that you do and checking them off of the list but looking at a broader understanding of nursing.”    Haylea Dorathy | UIC RN to BSN Graduate            Online Quantitative Research Program        “I’ve advanced my career, helped my company, and positioned myself for even greater future success. I highly recommend the UIC online quantitative research program for anyone interested in leading the charge in evidence-based decision making.”    Scott Frasard | UIC MEd in Measurement, Evaluation, Statistics and Assessment Graduate           Online Quantitative Research Program           Patient Safety Leadership Programs  Lead the change to a culture of safety and build a high reliability organization.             Nonprofit Management Program  UIC's Certificate in Nonprofit Management program provides just-in-time practical education.             Project Management Courses  UIC's Project Management courses teach best practices for managing complex, demanding projects and for managing teams.
